answer:
It is safe to receive the Shingrix (shingles) and influenza (flu) vaccines (given by injection) at the same time. Learn more about shingles here. Learn more about influenza here.
Immunization Nurse
question: Is it OK to get the Shingrix vacinne and the flu shot at the same time? If not, how far apart should they be?
